H0.text: Which island was home to Odysseus. Crete

H1.text: Which island was home to Odysseus. Rhodes

H2.text: Which island was home to Odysseus. Corfu

H3.text: Which island was home to Odysseus. Ιθάκη

A4.text: Modern Ithaca is generally identified with Homer's Ithaca, the home of Odysseus

A5.text: Coins from Ithaca frequently portray Odysseus, and an inscription from the 3rd century BC refers to a local hero-shrine of Odysseus and games called the Odysseia
